news.title: New website launched
news.body: We proudly anounce launching a new website after months in development

news.title: Mystery of the Mist release
news.body: Today is the day. Mystery of the Mist role playing game has been released acros PlayStation, Xbox and PC. Don't wait and claim your copy now!

news.title: MMO release date
news.body: After years in development, we've made a major progress and release of our upcoming MMORPG game Eternal Mist is closer than ever. Release date has been set up to 15.3.2025!

news.title: New comic is out
news.body: New comic series mapping events before Eternal Mist is starting now. First part of the series is out! Next part will be released on monthly bases.
